data.name: Advice_Critical_ImmediateAction
data.value: IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED: Secure your account immediately

data.value: Change your password right now

data.value: Enable two-factor authentication immediately

data.value: Review and revoke access for all devices

data.name: Advice_Critical_ContactSecurity
data.value: Contact security team if this activity was not authorized

data.value: Immediately review recent account activity

data.value: Consider changing your password

data.name: Advice_High_Enable2FA
data.value: Enable two-factor authentication if not already active

data.name: Advice_High_MonitorAccount
data.value: Monitor your account closely for the next few days

data.value: Monitor your account for unusual activity

data.name: Advice_Medium_Enable2FAConsider
data.value: Consider enabling two-factor authentication

data.name: Advice_Medium_ReviewLoginHistory
data.value: Review your recent login history

data.name: Advice_Low_Normal
data.value: Your account security appears normal

data.name: Advice_Factor_BruteForce_ChangePassword
data.value: Change your password immediately - brute force attack detected

data.name: Advice_Factor_BruteForce_ReviewDevices
data.value: Review and revoke access for any unrecognized devices

data.name: Advice_Factor_BruteForce_StrongerPassword
data.value: Consider using a more complex password or passphrase

data.name: Advice_Factor_NewLocation_Verify
data.value: Verify this login was made by you from the new location

data.name: Advice_Factor_NewLocation_SecureIfUnrecognized

data.name: Advice_Factor_NewDevice_Verify
data.value: Verify this login was made from your device

data.name: Advice_Factor_NewDevice_PublicDevice
data.value: If using a public or shared device, ensure you log out completely

data.name: Advice_Factor_UnusualHours_Secure
data.value: If this wasn't you logging in during unusual hours, secure your account immediately
